attributes.additional_details:
Travel companies, including agents, operators, airports, airlines, handlers, engineers, car parks, and the rest of the supply chain, only get paid when people travel. If no one travels, there is no income. Estimates suggest 100k+ jobs will go by September.
Agents are mainly family businesses built up over decades. There has been no income for over a year. The traffic light scheme is a mess of the Govs own making and makes no sense.
attributes.background: Introduce an immediate grant scheme for all travel agents or Extend the leisure grants to cover them. Extend the Covid 19 closure grants paid every month until a credible plan to reopen is in place. Freeze Covid loans & a specific travel only furlough scheme. Scrap Traffic light scheme.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of the Covid-19 outbreak, but your petition doesn't contain a clear ask for a specific action.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase compensation for small businesses & self-employed affected by COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568087

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
